subject: Re: [cc-community] Multinational Profit Day
body: On 29 Apr 2007, at 23:16, Terry Hancock wrote: So give the Devil his due, and get over it. If you really think it's a problem, start a better, more "community-based" site. Oh and make sure you don't offset your costs with advertising -- you wouldn't want to be a hypocrite! ;-)  My pleasure. http://www.libresociety.org/
